message: Let's start with a reasonable offer, Bob. 60/40 split seems fair.
Alice, let's be realistic. The rate of inflation makes your initial offer increasingly unattractive over time. I propose a 55/45 split in my favor.
Bob, I understand the inflation pressure, but your offer was too far in your favor.  Let's meet in the middle - this offer benefits both of us in the long run.
Alice, it seems we're at an impasse.  Let's cut to the chase and split this evenly. 50/50 - a fair deal considering the time pressure and inflation.
